values: To isolate is to separate one person or thing from a group.
The teacher isolated the bad child from the class before talking with her.
vt. 使隔离；使孤立；使绝缘
vt.使隔离，使孤立 a.孤立的
n. [生物] 隔离种群 vt. 使隔离；使孤立；使绝缘 adj. 隔离的；孤立的 vi. 隔离；孤立
